mapper.select: SELECT pattern_code, start_time, end_time, active FROM shift_pattern ORDER BY start_time ASC, end_time ASC, pattern_code ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shift_pattern(pattern_code, start_time, end_time, active) VALUES (#{patternCode}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, COALESCE(#{active}, true))
mapper.update: UPDATE shift_pattern SET start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, active = COALESCE(#{active}, true) WHERE pattern_code = #{patternCode}
